评论详情: This sweater is very cute.  Color is what was expected.  Sweater is warm and cute.  It is thick, fits well and is comfortable to wear.
This sweater is pretty heavy weight. It’s beautiful, it’s soft and very cute! It washes well, and overall just great quality sweater.
Ordered the green in Large. Color is true. Very pleased. Soft, thick, not scratchy, true to size. Would order again. Made well. I'm impressed.
This sweater is great quality and very cute. Super comfortable and I get lots of compliments on it. Good purchase for the money. I am a size 14-16 and ordered a XXL and it fits loose but as intended.

I can’t tell you how much I love this cardigan. I get so many compliments and it’s so comfortable and warm. It’s great quality and design. I know it’s going to last me for years. One of my favorite pieces and I would absolutely recommend. I’m plus size XL-2XL and this fits so well and still fashionably oversized without making me feel like a yarn ball. Well worth the price.

Who says you cant be fashionable in the cold.  I absolutely adore this cardigan. The pattern is unique, it's thick, heavy and soft.  I love the grey and white and have received compliments.  Compliments are nice.....

This cardigan is really beautiful! It’s thick and made well! It’s almost more like a sweater coat weight. Can be worn alone with a cami underneath or as a sweater coat in the spring and fall.  Love it!! I did return it for size. I purchased a small, my normal size, but I wanted it to come down a but longer. I’m 5’6” and 110-115 lbs. I also wanted that really oversized look like the model in the photos. The small definitely works but I just like sweaters really big so I can wrap them around if I’m cold. When returning for size I ended up ordering 3 colors so I could compare and see which I like best! They have so many beautiful colors! Unfortunately I’ve heard Amazon is cracking doen on returns. I hope nit because without an actual storefront you really have to order multiple sizes and colors to try on. This is my first time purchasing from Dokotoo and if all of their products are of this quality I will be ordering more!

I have received so many compliments on this sweater when I wear it out! It is so cute and looks exactly as pictured. The material is good quality and thick. It is slightly oversized. Would definitely recommend!

This sweater is absolutely adorable! It resembles the picture perfectly, with vibrant colors and a cozy fit. The quality is impressive, especially when compared to various outfits I've tried. I'm genuinely delighted with my purchase and excited to wear it!

I gave this 5 stars because it has a thicker material than I was expecting and is made pretty well. Doesn't come apart easily and very soft. I like the slightly oversized look of it on. If you don't like it that way then you should size down.
It's thick, soft, and good quality. Well worth the money.
Great find! Didn't expect the quality and the weight of the sweater. Perfect for cooler southern winter days
The thickness of this sweater is so comfy and warm. I absolutely love this!
Beautiful sweater. I should have ordered a size down as it is really wide! Love the colors and the pattern
Such a great sweater

I debated between a large or medium and decided on the large, for reference I'm 5'1" and 166lbs. The large had that perfect cozy fit, it's not a heavy, thick cardigan but I'd say it's perfect without being too bulky. I received so many compliments wearing this cardigan, I even had a girl stop me and asked if I wouldn't mind sharing where I bought it from then brought it up on her phone and purchased it. This cardigan is THAT good.
Absolutely love the sweater, but I ordered it too big so I had to return it

Beautiful sweater arrived wrapped securely as usual. You can see that it perfectly matches my cat, Harley who gave it 4 paws up!!! Such soft material and very high quality look. Buttons are top grade and fit was spot on. I am 5’6 155 and got a large with just enough room. I am not an influencer and did pay for this myself. I love it and love the color as well.
Excellent quality, got lots of compliments on this sweater., so much so that I also bought the yellow. I got the green and its beautiful!
Bought for my girlfriend, she loved it and said great quality sweater. Cute too ;)
I bought this for a gift and the receiver loved it and still wears it a lot!
The material is soft, thick and warm. If you want a more baggy fit go up a size. Great value for the price.
I’ve purchased 3 colors & always get compliments! High quality product
I got a lot of compliments on this. It’s thick and soft. I’m keeping my fingers crossed it doesn’t pill.
Great fit and quality
Love this cardigan!

Either get your regular size, go up one, or go down one. Whatever you decide just buy it. It’s kinda thick but it looks great! The colors are very vibrant and they are very well made. I’ve gotten so many compliments on these sweaters. I have the brown/tan, green, and pink.
This sweater is so cute and the color is the same as the picture.  True to size and very well made.  Perfect for winter or a chill.
This is amazing quality, super soft and luxurious- I didn’t have high hopes but I was still very impressed. It’s absolutely adorable too!
Great sweater
Nice. The quality is very good. Fits well. Grat purchase
Love the color, thick and heavy-so perfect for winter. Have worn it buttoned and open and liked it both ways!
Not over sized as advertised.  Ordered a mediums and it does not look as the one on model.  Fits like a regular carfigan
Sweater arrived today. Shape, thickness, color all nice. However I am returning as too big. MEDIUM was recommended size; way too large.

To be honest, I did return this sweater, but only because I’ve officially determined that I am not a sweater person. This was very pretty though, the knit is tightly woven, it is thick, it feels more expensive than it is. The colors are great. It was an oversized fit.
This top is so comfortable and cute. It is perfect with jeans or leggings. The color is exactly as pictured. The fabric is warm and soft as well!
Super cozy and beautiful! Can’t wait to wear in cooler weather, the fabric is so soft and warm but not hot. I live in AZ but this was still a good buy for the few instances I can rock it!
Fits well, Quality is amazing and love the style and weight to it. It’s definitely worth your money

great looking sweater.  Does run big but if you order your true size, it will fit but be more baggy. Still would look nice.  I ordered my true size and one smaller and decided which one when I got both. ended up keeping the size small instead of medium(my true size).  Was still baggy -not as much as the medium but not constricting.  What I liked best is the design print.  if I din't have too many other sweaters, I think I would have ordered one more in another color...
Super cute. It is a boxy cut so I just tuck in the front. VERY THICK. I’m a size medium shirt. 36B chest. I bought a medium.

So soft, so comfortable, very nice quality, I bought 3 different colors, I'm just waiting for the weather to change to wear them. I'm 5 8" 145 pounds, I bought size medium fit perfectly. Pink, red and brown.
I wasn’t sure what the quality of fabric was going to be but this is amazing, super soft and thick. I purchased the Green one and I absolutely love it! 10 out of 10 recommend.
Love this sweater! Perfect for the holidays or whenever. Nice thick material.
Love the color and on this.The pink is very pretty It is an oversized sweater , but I like that Fast Shipping
The quality of the sweater is amazing and thick. It looks and feels as if it were from a boutique.
Great sweater, Quality is great, heavy weight material,  so for those cold days. Delivery was quick.

评论详情: Love how soft this is. The over sized is perfect to wear over leggings while covering your backside. Wear buttoned up off shoulder or with a tank or under shirt. Perfect for the cooler weather! But so warm!
Very pretty, soft, and i recieved a lot of compliments.
Love it!  The color purple is fantastic! It’s a very heavy sweater! I might buy another color!
Works awesome , goes with just about any outfit
This cardigan is perfect. Such good quality,  very cozy

评论概述: High quality comfortable sweater! So cute!
评论详情: I love this sweater!  It is well made and adorable on! I thought about getting another color!!
I love this sweater, the material is so nice and soft, not scratchy at all!  It is oversized, I normally wear an XL and I sized down to a L and it is perfect.  If you are on the fence, get it!!
Sweater looked just like the photo.  Fit was perfect (I like oversized so I ordered a couple sizes higher).  It is comfortable and versatile.
This is an awesome sweater and very attractive looks great with jeans or you can dress it up.. love it!!

True to size, I’m 16/18 normally size 2xl and wanted this to be oversized so i ordered 3x and was very happy with the fit. The quality is fantastic, very soft and sturdy - a great fall/spring, transitional piece.
Soft, true to size, accurate color. Feels high quality!
Love the softness of this sweater! Excellent quality!
Really love this! Great quality, very soft and warm. Not itchy at all. I was very happily surprised by this order.
Love the soft, thick material. Not light weight. Washed and dried very well. Color just as the product photo.
I love the look and feel. Wish I got an extra large. Sooo soft. Might order another and give this as a gift.

评论概述: This is not a China knockoff!!
评论详情: Sometimes when you purchase things, you think you are going to get what you see and it ends up being some knockoff that is 10 sizes too small and costs more to return than it did to purchase. Not with this sweater!! I love this sweater so much that I bought another one in a different color. It is super soft!! and it's a heavier somewhat thick quality knit. It's not a cheap, thin, wish I had a heavier sweater kind of sweater. It will definitely help to keep you warm. It looks exactly like what is in the photo and fits well - true to size. It also arrived quickly and did not take a month to receive it. No disappointments at all with this purchase :)
This sweater runs big—I’m exchanging for a size smaller. The material is super soft and fairly thick (a little heavier than I expected). It will be perfect for a cold fall day!
So comfortable fits well

I have been a true XL for a while and recently lost some weight. Between L and XL, so I wear both sizes depending on the brand. I often find XL the best bet. Context for: I ordered the XL. It's perfectly oversized without looking baggy or lumpy. I also *could have* done the L for a smidge shorter effect (and still been able to button)... Ultimately kept the XL because of sleeve length. It's perfect now. Listen, this is at a cheap price point, but the quality is great. No snags, buttons on firm (not too tight they pop off in wash.) It also washed well! I can't say anything about tossing in the dryer, as I block and air dry all my sweaters for shape/form purposes. But there was little if any shrinkage in the wash. Stoked to have this for the fall! Durable enough to be a part of my wardrobe for a while!
Super cute, super soft, made well. Will buy more colors.
I can’t say enough good things about this piece. It’s absolutely stunning. Very well made! I highly recommend! It’s so soft, and true to size. Very worth the money.
This runs small, but a good material and quality
This sweater is so cute. It’s well made and will be great for winter in the desert. I bought it for my daughter but I’m going to end up borrowing it. From her.
Lovely sweater. Well made. Great design.
Obsessed is an understatement. This sweater is so incredibly soft. Wear it all the time throughout fall and winter!
I thought this would be out of shape and itchy but it was perfect.
love.y cardigan worth the money ,will buy more soon

Very thick material that bag be worn on or off the shoulder. It’s versatile in looks with the button vs unbutton and would be easy to tuck if needed. Looks best buttoned and partial tuck. Great work piece.
I sized up and wouldn’t have, it truly is a slouchy sweater but I don’t mind the bulk for the most part! I got an XL
Colors are good but it is a heavy sweater. In Texas, just won’t wear it too much. It is oversized so recommend sizing down.
This sweater will be a great addition to any wardrobe. It is really nice quality and pretty thick but super soft.

I absolutely love this sweater.  I received many compliments on it.  The fabric is soft and good quality.  I purchased a large, but could have went with a medium.  If you like your sweaters a little bigger then go with your normal size.  I typically buy XL in sweaters b/c I am a 40DD, but that would have been huge.  I am 5'8" 162 lbs.  I was a little sad that after I purchased it went on sale to $28.89 from $36.  It is a great sweater even though I did not catch the sale.

This is such a cute sweater. I had been wanting something with this pattern and I’m so glad I found this. For reference I am 5’1 147lbs so this was longer on me. Also I could have sized down and still have gotten the oversized look. Still it looks and feel fabulous

I buy most of my clothes on Amazon, and I must say this one takes the cake. Not only is it exactly like what is shown in the picture, the buttons are attached securely and the material is soft to the touch, even after a few washes. The fabric really holds its shape. You can wear it off shoulder or buttoned up for a more professional look and is true to size. I’m 5’6” and 160 lbs, the medium fit my just right. Highly recommend!
Love this sweater true to size. Looks just like the picture
Great quality material and the way it’s made.  I wear it with or without a shirt under it.  Very comfortable

I love this cardigan. The weight is so nice, it’s thick and so comfortable. It keeps me warm and has great sleeve length which is normally hard to find. I’ve washed multiple times and still love it, and I’ve even accidentally dried it and it didn’t shrink.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: I definitely bought this because it was recommended by one of my favorite TikTokers and I was not disappointed! The material is so thick and soft, it’s very comfortable and will be great for chilly fall days. The color and pattern are beautiful and very trendy. For reference I’m a size 16/18, and I think it fits appropriately if you want an oversized work, which I did. If I wanted a tighter look, I think a size down would definitely fit also though. I am very impressed and it’s going to make a wonderful addition for a fall staple in my wardrobe!
The sweater is made nice a little to heavy for me.  I thought it would be light weight

This is a fantastic sweater for the price. I bought the gray and white checkerboard and it's absolutely the best sweater that I've owned in quite some time.  I wear it all of the time...in the house, outside of the house...everywhere! Lol It is sturdy, well made, has a nice weight to it and for the price you can't beat it, go buy it!

The color is just as pictured. Very strong material. I usually wear XXL but I ordered the XL but I should have gotten the Large because it's really over sized. Not too bad though because I really like it.
Sometimes it’s hard to tell what the quality of the material is when buying online but I was genuinely happy with this purchase. Not very thin so it’ll be nice for the winter.

This was a Christmas gift for my mother & she loves it.  I purposely chose grey & white because of their neutrality and she wears it a lot!  Nice & heavy too.  The only flaw is that there are no pockets.
This sweater is super thick but soft. It looks cute on. Fit is bit so don't size up.
This sweater was nice and cozy. The color is nice very flattering would recommend it.

评论概述: Love it but not for me
评论详情: I wanted to love this so much! The quality is great, but once I put it on, I felt it just wasn't right for me.

I saw this sweater on a lady while visiting my hairstylist, and had to have it.  This is THE MOST beautiful sweater I have seen in my life.  It’s a classic look with a pair of jeans, or a pair of pants that can be dressed up, or worn as a basic.  It is absolutely gorgeous!

This is a really cute cardigan. It is a well-made tight knit sweater material  This does run really big. I normally wear xl but in got a large.  It’s still kinda big but I can still wear it with leggings. I bought my mom one too.
I’ll admit I was fully prepared to need to return this but it’s honestly perfect. Great quality and fit was exactly what I wanted.
Runs very large but the sweater is thick and cozy
Got this in green size small. I am 5’3” and 140# and it fits oversized. Softer and thicker than I expected. Great quality!
Is a nice sweater.  Heavier than I expected.  Runs large.
The sweater was heavy and cute! Runs a little big so if you don't want the baggy look order your regular  size. I'm a size  10, I wanted a baggy  look so I ordered  a medium  and it was perfect!

Very nice sweater. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality! Color is great, true to photos. It's also very soft. However I wish I bought a smaller size. I got a 3x and usually wear a 2x. It's so big on me. This was my fault though. (Everything I've bought off Amazon has always been small so I went up a size on this to avoid that). I'd stick to your usual size.
